SYSTEM_MAINTENANCE: In the system maintenance, please look
INTERFACE_MAINTENANCE: Interface in the maintenance, please look
WILL_OPEN_GAME: Is about to open, please look
SDK_INTERFACE_ERROR: The third party SDK interface call fails
REGION_NOT_SUPPORT: The region's users temporarily don't open
SYS_CONFIG_REFRESH: Configuration have been changed, please refresh the game
GAMING_NOT_COST_ITEM: Items cannot be consumed in the game
USER_NOT_SUPPORT_CHANNEL: User does not support the channels
USERNAME_PASSWORD_ERROR: The user name or password error
USER_SDK_TOKEN_INVALID: Token is invalid user a third party
USER_NOT_CONNECT: Users not connected to the server
PAY_SDK_GOODS_ID_INVALID: Pay channels goods ID is invalid
PAY_TYPE_NOT_SUPPORT: Does not support this payment method
